tha-ap327:0.3_0: are the most senior monk who regularly behaved in the propoundation.
tha-ap327:1.1_0: “Most people are on the bank of the rivers,
tha-ap327:1.2_0: I stayed in the perfected one.
tha-ap327:3.1_0: awakened for themselves, enders of the past,
tha-ap327:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap327:4.4_0: and the fruit of the Buddha.
tha-ap327:5.3_0: they don’t strive in the wilderness,
tha-ap327:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap327:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Night.
